statements.query: MATCH (b:GCPBinding)<-[:ATTACHED_BINDING]-(:GCPFunction)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE b.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH b LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (b) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Cloud Function Bindings that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPBinding)<-[a:ATTACHED_BINDING]-(:GCPFunction)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE a.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH a LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (a) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPBinding-to-Function relationships that are out of date.
